LanguageData.ApocalypseSurvivor23.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born during a time of unrest on [PAWN_possessive] homeworld, as climate change threatened mass starvation and flooding. As [PAWN_pronoun] grew up the situation worsened - billions died and peaceful states descended into anarchy. [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] parents did whatever they had to to survive.
LanguageData.ApocalypseSurvivor23.title: 종말의 생존자
LanguageData.CaveworldTender26.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in cave complex deep beneath the surface of an inhospitable world. [PAWN_pronoun] worked with the other children tending the tribe's fungus crops.
LanguageData.CaveworldTender26.title: 동굴계 파수꾼
LanguageData.CaveworldTunneler48.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a digger in the massive underground cave complex.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] knows rock so well that [PAWN_pronoun] can almost navigate caves by smell.
LanguageData.CaveworldTunneler48.title: 동굴계 땅굴쟁이
LanguageData.IndustrialOrphan13.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] never knew [PAWN_possessive] parents. [PAWN_possessive] earliest memories were of drudgery in the mines and workhouses of [PAWN_possessive] industrial world.\n\nBecause of this, [PAWN_pronoun] never received a proper education.
LanguageData.IndustrialOrphan13.title: 산업계 고아
LanguageData.Scout44.baseDesc: Born to the administrators of a rimworld colony, [PAWN_nameDef] was enrolled in a youth program that taught military scouting skills.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] learned to survive in the wilderness, to obey, and not to ask questions.
LanguageData.Scout44.title: 스카우트
LanguageData.ShelterChild50.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a shelter deep beneath a toxic world. [PAWN_pronoun] received a comprehensive education, but had no opportunity to do physical labour.
LanguageData.ShelterChild50.title: 대피소 아이
LanguageData.TestSubject15.baseDesc: On the most corrupt urbworlds, scientists without a moral compass commit unspeakable atrocities in the name of research. [PAWN_nameDef] was kept alone in a sealed facility from birth and subjected to a variety of behavioural experiments in an attempt to turn [PAWN_objective] into a perfect super-soldier.
LanguageData.TestSubject15.title: 실험체
LanguageData.UrbworldUrchin61.baseDesc: The urbworlds - ancient and deep industrial cityscapes bursting with humanity and poison. [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in the dark, unwanted reaches of such a place. [PAWN_pronoun] had to fight for every scrap of food.
LanguageData.UrbworldUrchin61.title: 도시계 부랑아
LanguageData.WreckageExplorer93.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef}에게는 부족을 지킬 책임이 있었지만, {PAWN_pronoun}는 행성 주변에 흩어진 추락한 전함들을 탐험하기 위해 농땡이를 부리곤 했습니다.
LanguageData.WreckageExplorer93.title: 잔해 탐험가
